change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Coin lists possibly relating to O.P. Eklund.
did.physloc: ANS Rare Book Room - Archives Pamphlet 2

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Paginated, undated, typed lists of 1,619 coins, dating from the 16th to the 19th century and containing annotated values (?) for each. Countries of origin include: Java; Tournay (Belgium); Netherlands; Denmark; Holland; Dutch Ceylon; Brabant (Netherlands); and Flanders. List is possibly associated with copper coins described by numismatist O.P. Eklund (1873-1950), e.g., Copper Coins of Norway (1945), Copper Coins of Denmark and her Possessions (ANS, 1962). “O.P. Eklund Sale – Apr. 1951” is written on one of the lists.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
